name: 簡良翰
objective: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。
schedule:
Week　　　　　　　　Topic (Sections)
1　　Introduction, Definitions, Units, Systems (1.1-1.3)
  　　Properties, State, Processes, Cycles (1.4-1.7)
2　　State postulate, Temperature 　　(1.8-1.9)
  　　Pressure, Problem-Solving, Energy (1.10-1.13, 2.1)
3　　Heat Transfer, Work (2.2-2.4)
4　　The First Law of Thermodynamics (2.5)
                   Energy Conversion Efficiencies　　(2.6)
5　　Pure Substance, Phase-Change　　(3.1-3.3)
6　　Property Diagrams　　(3.4)
                  Thermodynamic Property Tables (　　3.5)
7　　Moving Boundary Work　　 (4.1)
                  Energy Balance for Closed Systems (4.2)
8　　Specific Heats　　 (4.3)
                  Internal Energy, Enthalpy, Specific Heats for Ideal Gases (4.4)
9　　Midterm Exam
10. 　　Internal Energy, Enthalpy, Specific Heats of Solids and Liquids　　(4.5)
11　　Mass Balance for Control Volumes (5.1)
 　　Flow Work and the Energy of a Flowing Fluid (5.2)
12　　Energy Balance for Steady-Flow Systems (5.3)
13.　　Some Steady-Flow Engineering Devices (5.4)
 　　Nozzles, Diffusers, Turbines, Compressors　　(5.4)
14               Throttling valves, Mixing chambers, Heat exchangers, Pipe and duct flow (5.4)
15　　Unsteady-flow process　　(5.5)
                   Introduction to the Second law, Thermal Reservoirs (6.1-6.2)
16　　Heat engines 　　(6.3) 
                  Refrigerators, Heat Pumps, Perpetual-Motion Machines (6.4-6.5)
                  Reversible & Irreversible Processes, Carnot cycle　　 (6.6-6.7)
17　　Carnot Principles, The Thermodynamic Temperature Scale　　(6.8-6.9)　　
　　Carnot Heat Engine　　 (6.10)
                  Carnot Refrigerator and Heat Pump (6.11)
18 　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
作業及小考：35% + 期中考：30 + 期末考：35%
註：作業須於規定期限內繳交。逾期一週以內者以所得成績之 80% 計算；逾期一週以上者以零分計算。
materials: Cengel, Yunus A., and Boles, Michael A., Thermodynamics An Engineering Approach,  McGraw-Hill, 2015.
